title: CIE Students Win National Innovation Challenge
summary: Team from CIE secures first place in the National Innovation Challenge with their sustainable energy solution
content: A team of students from the Centre for Innovation and Entrepreneurship (CIE) has won the prestigious National Innovation Challenge 2025. Their project on sustainable energy solutions impressed judges with its innovative approach and practical implementation.
author: CIE Communications Team

title: New Industry Partnership Announced
summary: CIE partners with leading tech companies to provide more internship and job opportunities for students
content: The Centre for Innovation and Entrepreneurship is excited to announce new partnerships with several leading technology companies. These partnerships will provide enhanced internship opportunities, mentorship programs, and direct job placements for our students.
author: Industry Relations Team
